subject: App Issue | Eugene PD
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]


Hi @Flock Safety Support support@flocksafety.com  

Eugene PD said they are having some issues with taking a photo in the app and it isn't registering the license plate when taking a photo with the camera icon (photo attached). 

@DEWITT Derek A ddewitt@eugene-or.gov   can you confirm this vehicle drove past a Flock camera along with making sure you modified the "timeframe" for when it could have (under vehicle fingerprint on the search tab - example: 24 hours, 7 days, etc)? Just so our team has has much information as possible.


Thank you,
Gaby 


-- 

	
Gaby Mahoney
Customer Success Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=Success&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/RqGQ2llW1Gw.png>
